s.text: This description makes Dole's proposal sound more like an old Democrats' big-spending program than a tax cut.

Recycling phrases and images from earlier ads, the spot moves at light speed from campaign issue to campaign issue: deficits, education, and drug cuts, abortion, interest rates, and harm to the economy.

Recycling phrases and images from earlier ads, the spot moves at light speed from campaign issue to campaign issue: deficits, education, and drug cuts, abortion, interest rates, and harm to the economy.
Meanwhile, double-exposed images of kids, a woman, and the signs (literally) of a failing economy fill the screen, all punctuated by the grim visage of Bob Dole.
